profile_summary:
As a Senior Golang Developer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I bring expertise in **Go**, **AWS**, **Python**, **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **React**. My proficiency in building high-performance applications is complemented by a strong foundation in CI/CD automation, ensuring efficient deployment and operational excellence. I have a demonstrated history of successfully integrating third-party payment solutions like **Stripe** and **PayPal**, while implementing observability practices for enhanced performance optimization across projects.

I am well-versed in modern web technologies including **FastAPI** and **Django**, and have experience with data scraping and leveraging proxy networks for improved data pipeline efficiency. Additionally, I have utilized advanced frameworks for developing applications that integrate LLMs, enhancing user engagement and data analysis capabilities. Having led the development of enterprise-grade platforms, I prioritize security and compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while focusing on robust architecture and real-time data processing.
